util

Class Checker

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Checker

  • public class Checker
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks a collection of words for errors from a dictionary - a collection of most of the words of the respective language.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.3-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    SpaGeorgios, dionisispap98

      Checks if the String is contained within a language's or user's dictionary, for every string of the user input.

    • Method Detail

      • finder

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> finder(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> input1,
                                                                          java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> dictionary)
        Checks if the String is contained within a language's or user's dictionary, for every string of the user input.
        Parameters:
        input1 - A HashMap containing a string of the position of each word as its keys and the words to be checked themselves as values.
        dictionary - A HashSet which contains every word from the dictionary.
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing a string of the position of each wrong word as its keys and the words themselves as values.
